tool_description:
SMS TEXT API GATEWAY - CLOUD RESTFUL AND LIGHTWEIGHT API

Send and receive text messages directly from and to your web application or IT systems via our API. With access to our well documented and supported API you will be able to connect directly
name: SMS Text messaging gateway function
title: SMS Text messaging gateway function

api_list.name: SendSMS

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: Required – Sender Name (Alpha Numeric or Dedicated Long Code)

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Required – Mobile number in International Format & and one recipient per request. e.g. 447874481555 for UK

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Optional. Not required for normal text messages. This needs to be set to unicode, if sending the unicode message. ( e.g for Message in Arabic).
